text: This is going to be awesome <http://alistapart.com/blog/post/a-list-apart-on-air>

attachments.title: A List Apart: On Air
attachments.text: Ready for something new? We're excited to announce ALA: On Air, community-focused events where our readers can get to know our authors, staff, and others who are shaking up our industry. Mat Marquis shares all the details, and has specifics on our first event, Designing for Performance, coming up on February 26.
